Actions.Name: Create a contract
Actions.Description: Create a new contract based on the selected template.

Actions.Name: Delete a contract
Actions.Description: Delete a specific contract by its ID.

Actions.Name: Download a contract file
Actions.Description: Retrieve a specific contract file by its ID.

Actions.Name: Get contract details
Actions.Description: Retrieve the details of a contract by its ID.

Actions.Name: Get the status of a contract
Actions.Description: Retrieve the status of a specific contract by its ID.

Actions.Name: Ping
Actions.Description: Use this endpoint to check if the Oneflow API is available.

Actions.Name: Publish a contract
Actions.Description: Sends contract to participants for signing.

Actions.Name: Upload attachments
Actions.Description: Add attachment or a  PDF document to a contract.
